languages.text: {n}Маражай издевательски смеется.{/n} "Притащить провидцев в собственный шпиль в попытке устроить дизъюнкцию — это твои амбиции? Жаль, что ты не удосужилась возглавить хотя бы один рейд за последние годы — было бы занятно наблюдать, как ты приказываешь флоту таранить мон-кайские строения и детонировать двигатели ради видения светлого будущего кабала!"

{n}Marazhai laughs mockingly.{/n} "Dragging Farseers into our spire in an attempt to trigger a dysjunction — that was your grand vision? It is a pity you have not bothered to lead a single raid in recent years — it would have been entertaining to watch you order a fleet to fly headlong into mon-keigh structures and detonate their engines, all to secure a bright future for the Kabal!"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай издевательски смеется.{/n} "Притащить провидцев в собственный шпиль в попытке устроить дизъюнкцию — это твои амбиции? Жаль, что ты не удосужилась возглавить хотя бы один рейд за последние годы — было бы занятно наблюдать, как ты приказываешь флоту таранить мон-кайские строения и детонировать двигатели ради видения светлого будущего кабала!"

It is a pity you have not bothered to lead a single raid in recent years — it would have been entertaining to watch you order a fleet to fly headlong into mon-keigh structures and detonate their engines, all to secure a bright future for the Kabal!"

{n}Marazhai laughs mockingly.{/n} "Dragging Farseers into our spire in an attempt to trigger a dysjunction — that was your grand vision? It is a pity you have not bothered to lead a single raid in recent years — it would have been entertaining to watch you order a fleet to fly headlong into mon-keigh structures and detonate their engines, all to secure a bright future for the Kabal!"

{n}Marazhai laughs mockingly.{/n} "Dragging Farseers into our spire in an attempt to trigger a dysjunction — that was your grand vision? It is a pity you have not bothered to lead a single raid in recent years — it would have been entertaining to watch you order a fleet to fly headlong into mon-keigh structures and detonate their engines, all to secure a bright future for the Kabal!"

{n}Marazhai laughs mockingly.{/n} "Dragging Farseers into our spire in an attempt to trigger a dysjunction — that was your grand vision? It is a pity you have not bothered to lead a single raid in recent years — it would have been entertaining to watch you order a fleet to fly headlong into mon-keigh structures and detonate their engines, all to secure a bright future for the Kabal!"

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋嘲弄地大笑起来。{/n}“把先知绑到尖塔里，让他们引发混乱，莫非这就是你脑子里的宏伟计划吗？真是遗憾啊，你这几年里，甚至连一次突袭行动都没指挥过。要是由你来指挥，估计会相当有有趣！你肯定会命令舰队一头撞在猴子的建筑上，启动引擎自爆，这一切都是为了让阴谋团走向光明的未来！”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs mockingly.{/n} "Dragging Farseers into our spire in an attempt to trigger a dysjunction — that was your grand vision? It is a pity you have not bothered to lead a single raid in recent years — it would have been entertaining to watch you order a fleet to fly headlong into mon-keigh structures and detonate their engines, all to secure a bright future for the Kabal!"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋嘲弄地大笑起来。{/n}“把先知绑到尖塔里，让他们引发混乱，莫非这就是你脑子里的宏伟计划吗？真是遗憾啊，你这几年里，甚至连一次突袭行动都没指挥过。要是由你来指挥，估计会相当有有趣！你肯定会命令舰队一头撞在猴子的建筑上，启动引擎自爆，这一切都是为了让阴谋团走向光明的未来！”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai éclate d'un rire moqueur.{/n} « C'était donc ça, votre grande vision ? Traîner des Grands Prophètes dans notre tour dans l'espoir de déclencher une disjonction ? Quel dommage que vous n'ayez pas pris la peine de mener le moindre raid, ces dernières années... J'aurais pris grand plaisir à vous voir envoyer une flotte dans des structures mon-keigh pour détruire leurs machines pour assurer un bel avenir à la Kabale ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs mockingly.{/n} "Dragging Farseers into our spire in an attempt to trigger a dysjunction — that was your grand vision? It is a pity you have not bothered to lead a single raid in recent years — it would have been entertaining to watch you order a fleet to fly headlong into mon-keigh structures and detonate their engines, all to secure a bright future for the Kabal!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai éclate d'un rire moqueur.{/n} « C'était donc ça, votre grande vision ? Traîner des Grands Prophètes dans notre tour dans l'espoir de déclencher une disjonction ? Quel dommage que vous n'ayez pas pris la peine de mener le moindre raid, ces dernières années... J'aurais pris grand plaisir à vous voir envoyer une flotte dans des structures mon-keigh pour détruire leurs machines pour assurer un bel avenir à la Kabale ! »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se ríe, burlón.{/n} «Traer videntes a la torre para provocar una disyunción... ¿ese es tu gran plan? ¡Es una lástima que lleves años sin dirigir una incursión, habría sido entretenido verte ordenar a las flotas estamparse contra las estructuras mon-keigh y detonar los motores solo para asegurar un futuro brillante para la Kábala!».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs mockingly.{/n} "Dragging Farseers into our spire in an attempt to trigger a dysjunction — that was your grand vision? It is a pity you have not bothered to lead a single raid in recent years — it would have been entertaining to watch you order a fleet to fly headlong into mon-keigh structures and detonate their engines, all to secure a bright future for the Kabal!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se ríe, burlón.{/n} «Traer videntes a la torre para provocar una disyunción... ¿ese es tu gran plan? ¡Es una lástima que lleves años sin dirigir una incursión, habría sido entretenido verte ordenar a las flotas estamparse contra las estructuras mon-keigh y detonar los motores solo para asegurar un futuro brillante para la Kábala!».

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは嘲るように笑う。{/n}「分離をひこ起こすために、先見司たちを尖塔に引き摺り込むーー、それがお前の壮大な計画だろ？ここ最近、お前が一度も襲撃を指揮しなかったのは残念だぜーーさぞ見物だったろうにな。向こう見ずにモン＝ケイの建造物に艦隊を突っ込ませてエンジンを爆破、すべては陰謀団の明るい未来のためだ、ってな！」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs mockingly.{/n} "Dragging Farseers into our spire in an attempt to trigger a dysjunction — that was your grand vision? It is a pity you have not bothered to lead a single raid in recent years — it would have been entertaining to watch you order a fleet to fly headlong into mon-keigh structures and detonate their engines, all to secure a bright future for the Kabal!"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは嘲るように笑う。{/n}「分離をひこ起こすために、先見司たちを尖塔に引き摺り込むーー、それがお前の壮大な計画だろ？ここ最近、お前が一度も襲撃を指揮しなかったのは残念だぜーーさぞ見物だったろうにな。向こう見ずにモン＝ケイの建造物に艦隊を突っ込ませてエンジンを爆破、すべては陰謀団の明るい未来のためだ、ってな！」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lacht spöttisch.{/n} "Runenpropheten in Euren Turm zu schleppen, um zu versuchen, eine Disjunktion auszulösen — das war Eure große Vision? Ein Jammer, das Ihr seit Jahren nicht versucht habt, einen großen Überfall anzuführen — es wäre ein unterhaltsamer Anblick gewesen, wie Ihr Eurer Flotte befehlt, in Chem-Pan-Sey-Gebäude zu fliegen und ihre Triebwerke detonieren zu lassen, um der Kabale eine goldene Zukunft zu sichern!"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs mockingly.{/n} "Dragging Farseers into our spire in an attempt to trigger a dysjunction — that was your grand vision? It is a pity you have not bothered to lead a single raid in recent years — it would have been entertaining to watch you order a fleet to fly headlong into mon-keigh structures and detonate their engines, all to secure a bright future for the Kabal!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lacht spöttisch.{/n} "Runenpropheten in Euren Turm zu schleppen, um zu versuchen, eine Disjunktion auszulösen — das war Eure große Vision? Ein Jammer, das Ihr seit Jahren nicht versucht habt, einen großen Überfall anzuführen — es wäre ein unterhaltsamer Anblick gewesen, wie Ihr Eurer Flotte befehlt, in Chem-Pan-Sey-Gebäude zu fliegen und ihre Triebwerke detonieren zu lassen, um der Kabale eine goldene Zukunft zu sichern!"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, alaycı bir şekilde gülüyor.{/n} "O büyük vizyonun, ayrıklık tetikleme niyetiyle Ötesezenleri kulemize getirmek miydi yani? Son yıllarda tek bir baskın bile yönetmemiş olman çok yazık. Kabal'ın parlak geleceğini güvence altına almak için filona mon-keigh yapılarına kafadan dalıp motorlarını patlatma emri vermeni izlemek çok eğlenceli olurdu!"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs mockingly.{/n} "Dragging Farseers into our spire in an attempt to trigger a dysjunction — that was your grand vision? It is a pity you have not bothered to lead a single raid in recent years — it would have been entertaining to watch you order a fleet to fly headlong into mon-keigh structures and detonate their engines, all to secure a bright future for the Kabal!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai alaycı bir şekilde gülüyor.{/n} "Bir ayrıklık tetikleme niyetiyle Ötesezenleri kulemize getirmek miydi senin o büyük vizyonun? Son yıllarda tek bir baskın bile yönetmemiş olman çok yazık. Kabal'ın parlak geleceğini güvence altına almak için filona mon-keigh yapılarına kafadan dalıp motorlarını patlatma emri vermeni izlemek çok eğlenceli olurdu!"
